content.text: Simon bought an equal number of sandwiches and pies. A sandwich cost $4 and a pie cost $1.80 less than a sandwich. He paid a total of $279. How much did Simon pay for the pies?
content.text_latex: Simon bought an equal number of sandwiches and pies. A sandwich cost $4 and a pie cost $1.80 less than a sandwich. He paid a total of $279. How much did Simon pay for the pies?
